# Foam Everything - Spray Foam Industry Merchandise

> The #1 destination for spray foam industry merchandise and apparel.

## About

Foam Everything is the premier online store for spray foam industry professionals. We offer high-quality apparel including hoodies, t-shirts, and longsleeves featuring unique designs that celebrate the spray foam culture and community.

## Products

We sell spray foam industry merchandise:

- **Hoodies** ($45-55): Premium hoodies with industry-themed designs
- **T-Shirts** ($25-35): Comfortable tees for everyday wear
- **Longsleeves** ($32-42): Long sleeve shirts for all seasons
- **Vegas 2026 Collection**: Exclusive pre-order merchandise for SprayFoam 2026 Convention

## Brands

- **Foam Everything**: Our flagship brand with parody and original designs
- **Spray Foam Racing**: NASCAR-themed spray foam merchandise
- **Vegas 2026**: Convention exclusive merchandise
- **OnlyFoam**: Alternative lifestyle brand for spray foam pros

## Featured Event

### SprayFoam 2026 Convention & Expo
- **Dates**: March 22-25, 2026
- **Location**: Westgate Las Vegas Resort & Casino, Las Vegas, NV
- **Pre-orders**: Available now with early bird pricing (10-15% off)
- **Fulfillment**: Ship before event or convention pickup

## Swag Wars

Swag Wars is our competitive event series where spray foam professionals compete for prizes and bragging rights. Register at /swagwars.

## Industry Network

We're part of the spray foam media ecosystem:
- SprayFoamTV.com - 24/7 streaming platform
- SprayFoamRadio.com - AI-generated industry music
- NerfFusion.com - Custom Nerf accessories for convention foam wars

- Website: https://foameverything.com

## Technical

- Platform: Next.js e-commerce
- Payments: Stripe
- Forms: Netlify
